snippet: If ratified, the contract would settle a four-year dispute that led to protests and a boycott.
abstract: Hyatt Hotels reaches tentative agreement with union Unite Here, which represents thousands of its employees, ending four-year dispute.
lead_paragraph: If ratified, the contract would settle a four-year dispute that led to protests and a boycott.

headline.main: Hyatt and Union Agree on Terms
headline.print_headline: Hyatt and Union Agree on Terms
